STIG Manager

Contents:

  • Introduction and Features
  • Setup and Deployment
  • For Users
  • For Admins
  • The STIG Manager Project
  • Terminology and Concepts

Common Tasks:

  • Build A Collection with .ckl or XCCDF Files
  • Review a STIG on an Asset
  • Review an entire Collection at once
  • Accept and Reject STIG Reviews
  • Analyze Findings and Generate a POA&M
  • Check Evaluation Progress
  • Add Users
  • Export Accepted Results
  • Transfer Assets to Another Collection
  • Update STIGs
  • Having a problem? Let us know and submit an issue on GitHub!
STIG Manager
  • »
  • HTTP Routing Table

HTTP Routing Table

/assets | /collections | /op | /stigs | /user | /users
 
/assets
GET /assets Return a list of Assets accessible to the requester
GET /assets/{assetId} Return an Asset
GET /assets/{assetId}/checklists Return a multi-STIG CKL for an Asset and its mapped STIGs
GET /assets/{assetId}/checklists/{benchmarkId}/{revisionStr} Return JSON or a CKL file for an Asset and STIG
GET /assets/{assetId}/metadata Return the metadata for Asset
GET /assets/{assetId}/metadata/keys Return the keys of the provided Asset's metadata
GET /assets/{assetId}/metadata/keys/{key} Return the value of the provided Asset metadata key
GET /assets/{assetId}/stigs Return an Asset's STIG assignments
POST /assets Create an Asset
PUT /assets/{assetId} Set all properties of an Asset
PUT /assets/{assetId}/metadata Set a Asset metadata to the provided object
PUT /assets/{assetId}/metadata/keys/{key} Set the value of the provided Asset metadata key to the provided string
PUT /assets/{assetId}/stigs/{benchmarkId} Assign a STIG to an Asset
DELETE /assets/{assetId} Delete an Asset
DELETE /assets/{assetId}/metadata/keys/{key} Remove the provided Asset metadata key
DELETE /assets/{assetId}/stigs Delete all STIG assignments to an Asset
DELETE /assets/{assetId}/stigs/{benchmarkId} Delete a STIG assignment to an Asset
PATCH /assets/{assetId} Merge provided properties with an Asset
PATCH /assets/{assetId}/metadata Merge the provided object to a Assetmetadata
 
/collections
GET /collections Return a list of Collections accessible to the requester
GET /collections/{collectionId} Return a Collection
GET /collections/{collectionId}/checklists/{benchmarkId}/{revisionStr} Return the Checklist for the supplied Collection and STIG
GET /collections/{collectionId}/findings Return the Findings for the specified Collection
GET /collections/{collectionId}/grants/{userId}/access Return an accessLevel = 1 User's access to the specified Collection. Request must be made by a User with accessLevel >= 3 to the Collection.
GET /collections/{collectionId}/metadata Return the metadata for Collection
GET /collections/{collectionId}/metadata/keys Return the keys of the provided Collection metadata
GET /collections/{collectionId}/metadata/keys/{key} Return the value of the provided Collection metadata key
GET /collections/{collectionId}/poam Return a POAM-like spreadsheet for the specified Collection aggregated by groupId
GET /collections/{collectionId}/review-history Return history records for the specified Collection that meet the specified criteria
GET /collections/{collectionId}/review-history/stats Return history statistics for the specified Collection
GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews Return a list of Reviews accessible to the requester
GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId} Return a list of Reviews for an Asset
GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId} Return the Review for an Asset and Rule
GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata Return the metadata for Review
GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata/keys Return the keys of the provided Review's metadata
GET /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata/keys/{key} Return the value of the provided Review metadata key
GET /collections/{collectionId}/status Return the status statistics for the specified Collection
GET /collections/{collectionId}/stigs Return the STIGs mapped in the specified Collection
GET /collections/{collectionId}/stigs/{benchmarkId}/assets Get the Assets in a Collection attached to a STIG
POST /collections Create a Collection
POST /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId} Post one or more Reviews
PUT /collections/{collectionId} Set all properties of a Collection
PUT /collections/{collectionId}/grants/{userId}/access Set an accessLevel = 1 User's access to the specified Collection. Request must be made by a User with accessLevel >= 3 to the Collection.
PUT /collections/{collectionId}/metadata Set a Collection metadata to the provided object
PUT /collections/{collectionId}/metadata/keys/{key} Set the value of the provided Collection metadata key to the provided string
PUT /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId} Set all properties of a Review
PUT /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata Set a Review metadata to the provided object
PUT /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata/keys/{key} Set the value of the provided Review metadata key to the provided string
PUT /collections/{collectionId}/stigs/{benchmarkId}/assets Set the Assets mapped to a STIG
DELETE /collections/{collectionId} Delete a Collection
DELETE /collections/{collectionId}/metadata/keys/{key} Remove the provided Collection metadata key
DELETE /collections/{collectionId}/review-history Remove history records that meet specified criteria
DELETE /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId} Delete a Review
DELETE /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata/keys/{key} Remove the provided Review metadata key
PATCH /collections/{collectionId} Merge provided properties with a Collection
PATCH /collections/{collectionId}/metadata Merge the provided object to a Collection metadata
PATCH /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId} Merge provided properties with a Review
PATCH /collections/{collectionId}/reviews/{assetId}/{ruleId}/metadata Merge the provided object to a Review metadata
 
/op
GET /op/appdata Export application data
GET /op/configuration Return API version and configuration information
GET /op/cors-proxy/oidc/.well-known/openid-configuration Proxy a request to the OIDC provider's openid-configuration endpoint
GET /op/definition Return the API definition
POST /op/appdata Import and overwrite application data
POST /op/cors-proxy/oidc/token Proxy a request to the OIDC provider's token_endpoint
 
/stigs
GET /stigs Return a list of available STIGs
GET /stigs/ccis/{cci} Return data for the specified CCI
GET /stigs/rules/{ruleId} Return the defintion and associated checks and fixes for the specified Rule
GET /stigs/scap-maps Return a list of SCAP benchmarkIds mapped to Manual benchmarkIds
GET /stigs/{benchmarkId} Return properties of the specified STIG
GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions Return a list of revisions for the specified STIG
GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr} Return metadata for the specified revision of a STIG
GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/ccis Return a list of CCIs from a STIG revision
GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/groups Return the list of groups for the specified revision of a STIG.
GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/groups/{groupId} Return the rules, checks and fixes for a Group from a specified revision of a STIG.
GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/rules Return rule data for the specified revision of a STIG.
GET /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr}/rules/{ruleId} Return rule data for the specified Rule in a revision of a STIG.
POST /stigs Import a STIG or SCAP Benchmark
DELETE /stigs/{benchmarkId} Deletes a STIG (*** and all revisions ***)
DELETE /stigs/{benchmarkId}/revisions/{revisionStr} Deletes the specified revision of a STIG
 
/user
GET /user Return the requester's user information
 
/users
GET /users Return a list of Users accessible to the requester
GET /users/{userId} Return a User
POST /users Create a User
PUT /users/{userId} Set all properties of a User
DELETE /users/{userId} Delete a User
PATCH /users/{userId} Merge provided properties with a User
